messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 4312
messages.msgSnippet: ... sit ... You ... money ... Actually, I AM one of those people that goes into the pool little by little, cant stand the idea of too much change too quick.
messages.messageBody:
> You're going at it backwards. When you're going swimming you don't
sit
> around on the edge waiting to become used to the idea of cool water.
You
> get in first, then get used to it. Jump in Annette! Once you do the
money
> thing you'll find your attachments fade pretty fast. :)
>
> Dawn (in NS)

Actually, I AM one of those people that goes into the pool little by
little, cant stand the idea of too much change too quick. And especially
not if the water is too cold! But, possibly when our finances get
settled, I can manage to budget and set aside a little every week/month
for Nicolas w/o limits or expectations at all.
